DOC.brief_title: Impact Physical Activity Chronic Pelvic Pain
DOC.detailed_description: The primary aim pilot study evaluate impact moderate-intensity physical activity pelvic pain woman chronic pelvic pain . We develop moderate-intensity physical activity program patient chronic pelvic pain conjunction exercise physiologists physical medicine rehabilitation ( PM & R ) physicians . Based prior research fibromyalgia centralize pain disorder , hypothesize eight week moderate-intensity physical activity reduce pain intensity pain interference woman chronic pelvic pain . We also evaluate impact moderate-intensity physical activity physical function , fatigue , sexual function , sleep , anxiety , depression , catastrophization patient global impression change woman chronic pelvic pain . We hypothesize eight week moderate-intensity physical activity result improvement measure function quality life .
